name: Gem Slider Adventure
description:
Gem Slider Adventure has a beautiful and cute game style, ideal for girls to play with their families and to play in anytime and anywhere!

Features
- Designed for the beautiful girls.
- Easy and free fun to play, challenging to master.
- 1000+ well-designed puzzle levels.
- Helpful magical bossters to win jewels stars.
- Games you can play offline.
- No WIFI? No Problem!
- Classic jewels match 3 game.
